#summary List of available modules
#sidebar PluginBar

 * *[TestingAPI Plugin API]*: The plugin API is the module used by all plugins, and also to enhance tests.

{{{
<dependency>
    <groupId>com.mycila.testing</groupId>
    <artifactId>mycila-testing-api</artifactId>
    <version>X.Y</version>
</dependency>
}}}

 * *[PluginDB Database Plugin]*: Database integration

{{{
<dependency>
    <groupId>com.mycila.testing.plugins</groupId>
    <artifactId>mycila-testing-db</artifactId>
    <version>X.Y</version>
</dependency>
}}}
